channel.title: CVE Feed for shoheitanaka -- Japanized For WooCommerce
channel.description: The latest CVEs for shoheitanaka -- Japanized For WooCommerce

item.title: CVE-2023-0942|2023-02-21T19:29:16.761Z -- shoheitanaka -- japanized%20for%20woocommerce
item.description: The Japanized For WooCommerce plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Reflected Cross-Site Scripting via the ‘tab’ parameter in versions up to, and including, 2.5.4 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that execute if they can successfully trick a user into performing an action such as clicking on a link.
